interface.name: treeland_ddm

description.summary: core global for treeland - ddm connection

interface.description: This object is primarily used for establish connection between treeland and ddm.

request.name: switch_to_user

description.summary: call treeland to switch lockscreen user

request.description: Set lockscreen user to username. Ignore when username is "ddm".

request.name: activate_session
request.description: Activate treeland session. This will makes treeland try to take control of screen.

request.name: deactivate_session
request.description: Deactivate treeland session. This will release control of the screen, but not to close the current seats.

request.name: enable_render
request.description: Enable treeland rendering. This is primarily called after disable_render to resume treeland.

request.name: disable_render
request.description: Disable treeland rendering. This will prevent treeland from output to DRM device.

event.name: switch_to_vt
event.description: Call ddm to switch current virtual terminal to vtnr. ddm should take care of the switch and call ioctl respectively.

event.name: acquire_vt
event.description: Call ddm to acquire control of VT at vtnr. ddm should call VT_SETMODE respectively.
